name: PROJECT-DOT
description:
ProjectDOT is an action-horror game with puzzle elements.
It offers a challenging experience where you race against time.
Discover who you are and where you are. Solve the mystery... Controls Move:  "W,A,S,D" Jump: "Space" Flashlight: "F" Interaction: "E" Shoot:"M1" WARNING: THIS GAME HAS JUMPSCARES AND CONTAINS INTENSE LIGHTS.

Currently only Turkish language is available...
